select '' as from_address, '' as currency,'' as chain, address, '' as balance, username,addtime, updatetime, num, type from tw_recharge where 1=1 and company_id = #{obj.companyId}
and (user_code like concat('%',#{obj.username},'%') or username like concat('%',#{obj.username},'%'))
and (user_code like concat('%',#{obj.userCode},'%') or username like concat('%',#{obj.userCode},'%'))
union all SELECT tad.from_address, tab.currency,ta.chain_id as chain, ta.address, tab.balance,tu.username, tad.create_time as addtime, tad.update_time, tad.amount as num, 4 FROM tw_address_detail tad left join tw_address ta on tad.address_id = ta.id left join tw_user tu on ta.uid = tu.id left join tw_address_balance tab on ta.id = tab.address_id where tx_type=0
and (tu.user_code like concat('%',#{obj.username},'%') or tu.username like concat('%',#{obj.username},'%'))
and (tu.user_code like concat('%',#{obj.userCode},'%') or tu.username like concat('%',#{obj.userCode},'%'))
order by updatetime desc

SELECT COUNT(*) as count, DATE(addtime) AS date FROM tw_recharge WHERE 1=1 AND company_id = #{companyId} AND status = 2
AND addtime >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{startTime}) AND addtime <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endTime})
AND addtime >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{days} DAY)
GROUP BY DATE(addtime) ORDER BY date ASC
